title: The Jungle Book
movie_description: The Jungle Book is a 2016 American adventure drama film directed and produced by Jon Favreau, written by Justin Marks and produced by Walt Disney Pictures. Based on Rudyard Kipling's eponymous collective works

title: Koi Mil Gaya
movie_description: Rohit is a young man with a mental disability that leaves him with a mental age of a 10-year-old. When he accidentally establishes communication with an alien race, they visit Earth, and leave one of them behind. Rohit names the alien Jadoo and becomes friends with him.

title: Oggy and the Cockroaches

title: Ratatouille
